xmlText.p: MLB — Suspended Miami Marlins minor league RHP Ryan Newell 80-games without pay after testing positive for Dehydrochlormethyltestosterone and Seattle Mariners minor league RHP Jose Luis Santiago 140-games without pay after testing positive for Drostanolone and Oxandrolone.
CLEVELAND INDIANS — Agreed to terms with RHP Preston Claiborne on a minor league contract.
MILWAUKEE BREWERS — Agreed to terms with OF Lorenzo Cain on a five-year contract.
NEW YORK METS — Agreed to terms with INF Jose Reyes on a one-year contract. Designated LHP Josh Smoker for assignment.
SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS — Traded INF Engelb Vielma to Baltimore for a player to be named or cash considerations.
WICHITA WINGNUTS — Signed RHPs Austin Boyle and Josh Lang, and LHPs Felix Carvallo and LHP Peter Irvin.
SUSSEX COUNTY MINERS — Signed INF Jerrod Mederos.
MILWAUKEE BUCKS — Announced Joe Prunty will remain the coach for the rest of the season.

DELAWARE 87ERS — Acquired G Shannon Brown and F Cameron Oliver from Wisconsin for G James Blackmon Jr. and the returning player rights to G Russ Smith. Acquired a 2018 first-round draft pick and the returning player rights to Corey Hawkins from Northern Arizona for F James Michael McAdoo.

USADA — Announced cyclist Craig Webb accepted a four-year sanction for an anti-doping rule violation due to his refusal to provide a sample after he finished the 2017 Bell's Iceman Cometh Challenge on November 4, 2017.
ARIZONA CARDINALS — Named Al Holcomb defensive coordinator, Mike McCoy offensive coordinator and Jeff Rodgers special teams coordinator.
BUFFALO BILLS — C Eric Wood announced his retirement.
CALGARY FLAMES — Reassigned LWs Ryan Lomberg, Marek Hrivik and Andrew Mangiapane to Stockton (AHL).
DALLAS STARS — Reassigned F Jason Dickinson, D Dillon Heatherington and D Julius Honka to Texas (AHL).
DETROIT RED WINGS — Recalled F David Booth from Grand Rapids (AHL). Assigned F Dominic Turgeon to Grand Rapids.
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Assigned F Kevin Rooney and G Mackenzie Blackwood to Binghamton (AHL).
NEW YORK ISLANDERS — Loaned Fs Michael Dal Colle, Ross Johnston and Tanner Fritz to Bridgeport (AHL).
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned D Tony DeAngelo and Fs Peter Holland and Vinni Lettieri to Hartford (AHL).
SAN DIEGO GULLS — Assigned C Mitch Hults to Utah (ECHL).
COLUMBUS CREW SC — Signed D Milton Valenzuela.
NEW YORK CITY FC — Signed D Ben Sweat.
ARKANSAS — Signed men's basketball coach Mike Anderson to a two-year extension through the 2021-22 season.
FLORIDA — Named Larry Scott tight ends coach.
MEMPHIS — Named Desmond Lindsey wide receivers coach.
MICHIGAN STATE — Announced the retirement of athletic director Mark Hollis.
MISSOURI — Fired softball coach Ehren Earleywine.
WESTERN KENTUCKY — Raised men's basketball coach Rick Stansbury's base annual salary.
